file_content.text: Another ex-Intelligence agent, eh? Welcome to the military.
Corellia Control to unregistered vessel. Hold for Captain Trage.
It's our privilege, sir. Most ex-Intelligence agents don't come so highly recommended.
I understand you're transferring to Lord Razer's brigade; as a representative of the Sith, you've been assigned the rank of major.
Tell me where I'm needed.
Understood, Captain.
According to your transfer forms, you've been assigned the rank of lieutenant and placed in Lord Razer's brigade.
What are my orders, sir?
Understood, Captain.
I haven't been briefed--what's the state of the planet?
Tell me about Corellia.
The advantage is ours, but this is a Republic Core World--it'll be street-by-street fighting until the end.
Report to Lord Razer's briefing room. Operations begin immediately.
And don't expect the "flexibility" your former career may've offered you. This is war, and discipline is the key to victory.
I'll be back at Intelligence within the month.
This "transfer" is a joke.
Instructions are to report to Lord Razer's war room. He has an operation starting immediately.
I also suggest you familiarize yourself with our regulations. Discipline is the key to victory in this war.
At least the world still fears the Hand of Jadus.
Poor guy wants to spit in your face, but you're still the Hand of Jadus. They can't take that one away.
I wouldn't know. In the meantime, you will learn discipline and take your duties seriously.
Now report to the war room. Operations begin immediately.
Lieutenant, huh? What does that make me...?
Not an auspicious beginning, is it?
